course_title: Interpretation of The New Testament I
class_notes: (THIS CLASS IS FULL; contact candlerregistrar@emory.edu to request to be placed on the waiting list) (Prerequisites for MDiv and Special Students: OT 501 and OT 502 or equivalent)  (ONLINE; synchronous live sessions Thursdays 6-8pm; remaining contact time fulfilled via asynchronous online engagement)
course_description:
An introduction to the contents and concepts of the New Testament writings, with
attention to the historical, literary, and theological dimensions of these biblical books.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 5751, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 6-8p, Instructor: J. Wyant, Status: Closed
